lead_paragraph: FIFA president Gianni Infantino deserves to be shown a red card on the evidence of his first 100 days in office, campaigners seeking reform of the world football body said on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Campaign Group Sees 'Same Old' FIFA Under Infantino
headline.main: Campaign Group Sees 'Same Old' FIFA Under Infantino

snippet: FIFA president Gianni Infantino deserves to be shown a red card on the evidence of his first 100 days in office, campaigners seeking reform of the world football body said on Tuesday....
